mapper.select: SELECT c.mtl_chk_code, c.mtl_chk_date, c.mtl_date, n.mtl_code, n.bp_code, n.mtl_name, c.mtl_chk_cnt, c.mtl_error_cnt, c.mtl_pass_cnt, c.mtl_chk_manager FROM mtl_chk c JOIN mtl_need n ON c.mtl_code = n.mtl_code WHERE bp_code = #{bpCode} AND mtl_date BETWEEN #{mtlDate} AND #{mtlDate}+1

SELECT * FROM mtl_chk c
mtl_chk_code LIKE '%'||#{mtlChkCode}||'%'
ORDER BY mtl_chk_code ASC

SELECT * FROM mtl_chk c
mtl_chk_date LIKE '%'||#{mtlChkDate}||'%'
ORDER BY mtl_chk_code
SELECT * FROM mtl_chk c JOIN mtl_table t using(mtl_code) ORDER BY mtl_chk_code
